s2.title: &XercesCName; Latest Changes in CVS since December 6, 2001

tr.td: Performance: Do not transcode twice in DOMString constructor.
update BUILDINSTRUCTIONS.TXT to be in sync with build instruction in build*.xml.
iSeries (AS/400) documentation update and other iSeries related fixes.
[Bug 5367] Progressive parse does not throw error when file is empty.
Performance: Remove obsolete code in ElemStack.

More changes to IconvFBSDTransService. Allow using "old" TransServece implementation (via '-t native' option to runConfigure) or to employ libiconv (it is a part of FreeBSD ports-collection) services.
[Bug 5320] 1.5.2 Build fails on IRIX. The variable "atomicOpsMutex" has been defined twice.
Swap checking to avoid "dangling pointer" reported by BoundsChecker.

Schema: Add Identity Constraint(Key, KeyRef, Unique, Selector, Field, and Partial XPath Support).
Add XPathSymbols,
XPathMatcherStack,
XPathMatcher,
XPathException,
XercesXPath,
ValueStoreCache,
ValueStore,
IdentityConstraint,
IC_Unique,
IC_Selector,
IC_KeyRef,
IC_Key,
IC_Field,
FieldValueMap,
FieldActivator.
Support Particle Derivation Constraint Checking.

DatatypeValidator:
Support DateTimeValidator,
DateTimeDatatypeValidator,
DateDatatypeValidator,
TimeDatatypeValidator,
DayDatatypeValidator,
MonthDatatypeValidator,
MonthDayDatatypeValidator,
YearDatatypeValidator,
YearMonthDatatypeValidator,
DurationDatatypeValidator.
Add SchemaDataTimeException,
XMLAbstractDoubleFloat,
XMLDateTime.
[Bug 1959] setNodeValue throws exception when spec specifies NOP.
Performance Enhancement. Added setNPrefix and setNLocalPart methods in QName that allow code to take advantage of the fact that it knows the length of the prefix and local name, when possible.
Performance Enhancement. Added a second ContentSpecNode constructor that allows the QName to be just assigned, not copied.
Performance Enhancement. Added a second CMLeaf constructor that indicated the QName passed in was to be adopted.
Performance Enhancement. Modify the handling of the fNEL option so that it results in fgCharCharsTable being modified, instead of having all of the low-level routines check the option.
Make the runConfigure and associated config*, Makefile* in folders tests, samples and src more consistent.
Fix runConfigure which can run into infinite loop with invalid argument
Generate linker map for certain platforms
[Bug 5237] PATH_MAX undefined during build without threading support.
DOMMemTest: delete compiler generated temperary DOMString object "Hello Goodbye".
Do not increment the error count if it is a warning.
[Bug 4544] DOM_NodeList::getLength incorrect when called twice for empty list.
[Bug 2238]libWWW problems with broken proxys and range requests.
[Bug 3683] Access Violations when performing custom schema validation.
Check tohash pointer before accessing content in XMLString::hash.
Fix packageBinaries.pl to correctly strip the zip file name from the target directory which has "." dot in it.
Eliminate Warning from Solaris Forte C++: Warning (Anachronism): Formal argument start_routine of type extern "C".
Eliminate Warning from Solaris Forte C++: Warning: String literal converted to char* in initialization.
[Bug 4655] config.status be included in all future binary releases.
Eliminate Visual C++ compiler warning C4273.
Schema: Allow "0.0" to be a valid lexcial representation of ZERO.
Peter A. Volchek and PeiYong Zhang

New method InputSource::get/setIssueFatalErrorIfNotFound to tell the parser whether to issue fatal error or not if cannot find it (the InputSource). This is required for schema processing as it shouldn't be a fatal error if the schema is not found.

Allow schemaLocation and noNamespaceSchemaLocation to be specified outside the instance document. New methods setExternalSchemaLocation and setExternalNoNamespaceSchemaLocation are added (for SAX2, two new properties are added).
XMLFloat and XMLDouble boundary Values updated.
Add test case InitTermTest to test XMLPlatformUtils:Initialize/Terminate() pair.
Design change: GeneralAttributeCheck is not longer a singleton class.
Move root element check from XMLValidator to XMLScanner and deprecate XMLValidator::checkRootElement().
Update documentation for SAX2XMLReader, DefaultHandler and DOMParser.
Regular Expression: Update the Block Names and Block Range to comply to the latest standard.
DOMIDTest/MemParse fix: Pulled the hardcoded encoding out of the document itself and made it a #define to make it easier to support other encodings.
DOMMemTest fix: Changed some literal values to their equivalent hex values so they work correctly on both ASCII and EBCDIC systems.
Bug Fix: maxChars in XMLString::copyNString is more related to the target than the src.
Performance: Create QName in ContentSpecNode only if it is a leaf/Any/PCDataNode.
Performance: move getRawName() to outer loop in DFAContentModel so that it is called only once per outer loop.
IDOM: Leak: should allocate the fNodeListPool with the overloaded new.
Update samples doc to reflect the latest changes. Also update runConfigure usage in build doc to reflect the latest changes.

Schema:
Support group,
attributeGroup,
all,
any,
anyAttribute,
annotation,
notation,
redefine,
circular import.
Add AnySimpleTypeDatatypeValidator.
Add XercesGroupInfo.
More complex type constraint checking.

DatatypeValidator:
Support DoubleDatatypeValidator,
FloatDatatypeValidator,
AnyURIDatatypeValidator,
AbstractStringValidator,
AbstractNumericValidator,
AbstractNumericFacetValidator,
NCNameDatatypeValidator,
NameDatatypeValidator.
Add XMLDouble,
XMLFloat,
XMLInteger,
XMLNumber,
XMLUri.

Schema:
Support xsi:type,
Unique Particle Attribution Constraint Checking,
anyAttribute in Scanner and Validator.
Add XercesElementWildCard,
AllContentModel,
XMLInternalErrorHandler.
XMLDeleterFor related functions and data are removed. Replace with XMLRegisterCleanup.
[Bug 2924] runConfigure script to accept multiple linker options.
[Bug 2924] runConfigure script to accept multiple compiler options.
[Bug 4121] BinHTTPUrlInputStream needs to read entire HTTP header.
[Bug 4318] Single threaded build fails due to obsolete #define.
[Bug 2860] gAtomicMutex should be used when APP_NO_THREADS is not defined in both Tru64 and OS400.
Comment outside root element should also be reported.
[Bug 3975] XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize() leaks memory after thousands of calls.
[Bug 3813] BinHTTPURLInputStream has weak HTTP request capabilities.
Fixed xml4com.idl which attempts to set the version of the type library to 1.5.2 when only major.minor format is allowed.
[Bug 4060] XMLPlatformUtils leaks a mutex on Solaris, Linux and others.
[Bug 880] XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate cannot be called more than once.
Check that memory has been acquired successfully after memory acquisition requests in DOMString.
[Bug 3361] "String pool id was not legal" error in Attributes::getURI().
castToNodeImpl is inconsistent with other cast routinesin IDCasts.
Add new file name shortening hints; chmod +x.
Cleanup handling of transcoder failure to transcode a character; implement canTranscodeTo; thanks to Geoff Coffey.
Correctly swap / and : in classic environment MacOS pathnames; thanks to Geoff Coffey.
Update MacOS projects for CodeWarrior 7 and ProjectBuilder 1.1, new files.
[Bug 3909] return non-zero an exit code when error was encountered.
Modify PParse not to hardcode the number of expected elements as this may vary.
Fixed the binary search in XML256TableTranscoder.cpp which fails for the last item in whichever table it is searching.
Added U+0110 to XMLEBCDICTranscoder.cpp's "Unicode to IBM037" translation table.
Modified DOMPrint and IDOMPrint not to use "endl" method which puts out a newline in the local code page to generate output.
[Bug 3666] Win32MsgLoader unable to retrieve error text if DLL is renamed.
[Bug 1699] Redirect "delete this" to a temp ptr to bypass AIX xlC v5 optimization memory leak problem.
XMLURL::parse now throws an exception if it sees a an http URL without two forward slashes ('//') following the protocol.

[Bug 1685] memory leak after parsing document with validation error.
And other miscellaneous memory leak.
[Bug 3831] -1 returned from getIndex() needs to be checked.
Memory leak in IDOM, need to delete the fDocument created.
Patch: Xerces 1.5 w/ libWWW for Tru64.
Patch: Xerces 1.5 samples with g++ compiler.
[Bug 3155] SAX2 does not offer progressive parse.
[Bug 3523] SchemaElementDecl.cpp(242) : error C2202 : not all control paths return a value.
Performance: Store the fGrammarType instead of calling getGrammarType all the time for faster performance.
[Bug 3170] URLs with ? type fragments in them don't work.
Allowing -p as argument to -z or -l in runConfigure.
Performance: Use XMLBufBid instead of XMLBuffer directly for better performance.
Performance: No need to new the child QName in ElemStack addChild. Remove it for performance gain. for BCB5.
[Bug 3017] MSVC5.0: C2202: 'compareSpecial' : not all control paths return a value.
Fix to memory leak in buildDFA().
Performance: stateTable created to optimize the identification of new state created.
Add isHex(), isAlphaNum(), isAllWhiteSpace() and patternMatch() in XMLString.
[Bug 2947]IDOM segfault calling getElementsByTagName() using a DOM_Document().
Port test case DOMTest to IDOMTest.
[Bug 2676] IDOM: pure virtual called in IDDeepNodeListImpl::item().
IDOM: Unaligned Access warnings in IDOM samples.
Allow DOMCount/SAXCount/IDOMCount/SAX2Count to take a file that has a list of xml file as input.
Fix bug in 'transcode' functions reported by Evgeniy Gabrilovich.
put getScanner() back as they were there before, not to break existing apps.
[Bug 2751] Several NameChar characters missing from internal tables.
[Bug 2815] util/regx/RegxParser.cpp compile fails on HP-UX 10.20 with CC A.10.40.
Add IDOMCount, IDOMPrint, SAX2Count, and SAX2Print to samples.dsw.
[Bug 2643] - derivation by extension of complex types does not permit addition of ONLY element content.
[Bug 2512] typing mistake in code example of chapter "Constructing an XML Reader".
APIDocs fix: default for schema processing in DOMParser, IDOMParser, and SAXParser should be false.
Add new files to UnionTypeValidator and ListDataTypeValidator to MacOS Project files.
Add constraint checking for simple types.
Fix to normalizeWhiteSpace: synchronize fDatatypeBuffer with toFill.
Give proper error messsage when scanning external id.
The first char of PI Target Name should be checked.
Partial Markup in Parameter Entity is validity constraint and thus should be just error, not fatal error.
Add new samples projects: IDOMPPrint and SAX2Print for ProjectBuilder
Update ProjectBuilder Xerces project for latest file additions.
Add new samples for CodeWarrior build: IDOMPrint and SAX2Print.
New file for use in building Carbon samples.
Fix clean and distclean targets; broken because rm fails if passed no files.
Encoding String must present for external entity text decl.
Standalone checking is validity constraint and thus should be just error, not fatal error.
Some compilers (e.g. the HP compiler) has mistaken the parameter 'std', which is short for standalone as the special prefix used by the standard libraries.
Supporting dce threading on AIX and Solaris.
[Bug 2365] Huge performance problem with the parser in XMLScanner::sendCharData().
[Bug 2363] XMLScanner::sendCharData() can send the wrong length to the handler.
[Bug 2353] Validating Parser parses after validation failed.
[Bug 2119] DOMString::print() should use DOMString::transcode() for transcoding.
[Bug 965] scanDocTypeDecl messes up the source offsets.
Add constraint checking on elements in complex types.
[Bug 2225] assignment vs. comparison in if clause.
[Bug 2257] 1.5 thinks a <?xml-stylesheet ...> tag is a <?xml ...> tag.
[Bug 1946] Standalone validity check only for external decl.
Proper Debug Guard: Reported by Dean.
Namespace should be off by default in XMLScanner.
Add installAdvDocHandler to SAX2XMLReader as the code is there already.
Added constraint checking for ref on elements.

Schema:
Add Schema support in XMLParsers (DOM/SAX/SAX2), XMLScanner.
Create SchemaValidator.
Add Grammar Model.
Support xsi:nil.
Support xsi:schemaLocation and xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation.
Update samples to enable schema.
Break DTDValidator into DTDGrammar, DTDScanner, and DTDValidator.

IDOM:
Complete the Range, TreeWalker, NodeIterator, and other memory fixes.
Support IDOM on UNIX platform.
Add samples IDOMPrint, and IDOMCount.
Add test cases IRangeTest and ITraversal.

Schema:
Add Regular Expression.
Add Schema Messages.
Add Schema Simple Type Support.
Add Schema Complex Type Support (Except Group).
Add Schema Attribute Declarations support.
Add Schema Element Declarations support.
Support Simple Content and Complex Content.
Support Element and attribute reuse using "ref".
Support Schema Choice and Sequence.
Support Schema Import and Include.

Schema:
Add Schema support in Content Model.
Add Schema Exception Handling.
Add Schema XUtil.
Add QName Support.
Support SubstitutionGroup.

DatatypeValidator:
Support Base64DatatypeValidator,
BooleanDatatypeValidator,
DecimalDatatypeValidator,
HexBinDatatypeValidator,
StringDatatypeValidator,
InvalidDatatypeFacetException,
InvalidDatatypeValueException.
[Bug 812] Memory leak with multiple !ATTLIST on single !ELEMENT.
Documentation and project files update for Xerces 1.5.
Fix no error message for faulted-in attributes if reuse grammar for 3+ times.
Fix invalid file references in project.

/src/util/regx RegxParser.cpp
Fix two improper NULL tests.
Add support for Mac OS X command line configuration and build.
The start tag "<?xml" could be followed by (#x20 | #x9 | #xD | #xA)+.
Add support for tracking error count during parse; enables simple parse without requiring error handler.

/scripts/packageSources.pl
Keep the BCB4 project files in the source package.

Check for existance of MacOS Unicode Converter routines prior to instanciating our transcoder object; Xerces will thus panic, rather than crash, if they don't exist. Add support to check for existance of MacOS Unicode Converter to avoid calling through NULL pointer.
[Bug 1158] built-in buffer limit could be smaller than system limit, use PATH_MAX instead.
[Bug 1500] The public id was set twice and the system id was not set on Notations.
Added new option to the parsers so that the NEL (0x85) char can be treated as a newline character.
DTDScanner: Reuse grammar should allow users to use any stored element decl as root.
MacOSUnicodeConverter: Fix include path, Updates to reflect changes for Mac OS X final and Update MacOS projects for Mac OS X final ProjectBuilder.
[Bug 1303] AttrImpl: allow value to be set to null.
DOMParser: Attribute default values not printed in document type internal subset interface.
DTDElementDecl: Error checking for null content spec.
[Bug 1150] Problems with Namespaces and validating parsing.
When Standalone="yes", it is NOT supposed to accept element which is defined in external DTD with #FIXED attribute.
Update packageBinaries.pl for ICU 1.8. ICU debug .lib file names and locations changed.
[Bug 1018] AutoSense looks for "IRIX" when it should look for "sgi" or "__sgi".
[Bug 1069] The Makefiles fail to locate .cpp -> .o dependency and rebuild .o all the time.
[Bug 1021] Accessing an XML file using the file "protocol" and a UNC path fails to open the file.
[Bug 733] Seg fault when trying to parse empty filename.
[Bug 677] Infinite loop caused by malformed XML. Happen when namespace is on.
Enabling libWWW NetAccessor support under UNIX. Tested with latest tarball of libWWW (w3c-libwww-5.3.2) under RedHat Linux 6.1.
[Bug 678] StdInParse doesn't output filename or duration.

ICUTranscoder::transcodeFrom() expects ICU function ucnv_toUnicode to return an extra element in fSrcOffsets to allow us to figure out the last char size, which in fact it is not. The fix is to compute the last char size ourselves using the total bytes used.
Change limit test to reduce spurious pointer assignment warnings from BoundsChecker.
Better FAQ for the checksum error.
Core dump when UTF-16 encoding contradicts actual encoding.

Update samples/tests files for on UnixWare 7.1.1 with gcc 2.95. Add UNIXWARE platform defines to Makefile.incl, add recognition of sysv5uw7 to configure.in, and add unixware as recognized platform to runConfigure.
Update support for SCO UnixWare 7 (gcc). Tested under UnixWare 7.1.1 with gcc version 2.95.2 19991024 (release) with gmake 3.79.1.
Enable COMPAQ Tru64 UNIX machines to build xerces-c with gcc (tested using COMPAQ gcc version2.95.2 19991024 (release) and Tru64 V5.0 1094).
Rearranged statements in Initialize() so that platformInit() is called before an XMLMutex is created.
[Bug 766] /src/util/Compilers/CSetDefs.hpp: define NO_NATIVE_BOOL macro only if not pre-defined/reserved.
Add createPDF.jar and apachPDFStyle.xsl to convert documentation xml files to pdf format.
